pr_title: Fix operators that should be using IS NOT DISTINCT FROM rather than EQUALS

timeline.message: Add NOT DISTINCT operations to PagesHashStrategy
Fix StreamingAggregationOperator with proper DISTINCT grouping semantics
Fix WindowOperator with proper DISTINCT peer group semantics

Revert "Force TopNRankingOperator compatibility with current Window behavior"

This reverts commit ade8af11027ce287df976a95137349ff49240365.

Revert "Force TopNRankingOperator compatibility with current Window behavior"

This reverts commit ade8af11027ce287df976a95137349ff49240365.

timeline.author: sopel39
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -577,11 +577,11 @@ private IntegrityStats verifyHeapIntegrity(long groupId, long heapNodeIndex)
         verify(actualPeerGroupCount == peerGroupCount, "Recorded peer group count does not match actual");
